name: Asteroid - Godot Jam #25
description:
Asteroids

My entry for Godot Jam #25
The goal is to destroy the asteroids before they reach the earth and destroy it. Upon destroyed, some asteroids can throw a power up. Catching the power up upgrade the spacehsip. If the spaceship is touched, it looses a power up, if it has no power up, the spaceship is destroyed.

Controls :
- arrow keys to move, space to start/shoot
- controller is supported
